title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Fry pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger. Add chicken and curry powder. Stir in tomatoes and coconut milk. Simmer.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables with garlic and ginger. Add soy sauce and cook until tender.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing. Top with croutons and parmesan.

title: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa and let it cool. Mix with vegetables, feta, and olives. Dress with lemon juice.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef with taco seasoning. Fill tortillas with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

title: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add mushrooms and rice. Gradually stir in broth until rice is cooked. Finish with parmesan.

title: Greek Yogurt Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

title: Baked Salmon
instructions: Season salmon with salt, pepper, and dill. Bake with lemon slices on top until cooked through.

title: Sweet Potato Fries
instructions: Cut sweet potatoes into fries. Toss with olive oil, paprika, salt, and pepper. Bake until crispy.

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine. Sauté chicken with garlic. Make Alfredo sauce with cream, butter, and parmesan. Combine all.

title: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Sauté onions, carrots, and celery. Add potatoes, tomatoes, and broth. Simmer until vegetables are tender.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add milk, egg, and melted butter. Cook on a griddle until golden brown.

title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Layer tomatoes and mozzarella. Top with basil. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

title: Tuna Salad
instructions: Mix tuna with mayonnaise, celery, onion, and pickles. Serve over lettuce.

title: Lentil Chili
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add lentils, tomatoes, and spices. Simmer until lentils are tender.

title: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Cook pasta. Sauté vegetables in olive oil. Toss with pasta and parmesan.

title: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Cook beef and mushrooms with onion and garlic. Stir in sour cream and beef broth. Serve over noodles.

title: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Mix chickpeas with vegetables and feta. Dress with lemon vinaigrette.

title: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook linguine. Sauté shrimp with garlic in butter. Toss with linguine, lemon, and parsley.

title: Baked Ziti
instructions: Cook ziti. Mix with marinara, ricotta, and mozzarella. Bake with parmesan on top.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Stuff bell peppers with a mixture of ground beef, rice, and tomato sauce. Bake and top with cheese.

title: Frittata
instructions: Whisk eggs and mix with vegetables and cheese. Cook in a skillet until set.

title: Cobb Salad
instructions: Arrange ingredients on lettuce. Serve with dressing.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Sauté beef with onion, garlic, and carrot. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Combine with spaghetti.

title: Chicken Parmesan
instructions: Bread and fry chicken. Top with marinara sauce and cheese. Bake until cheese is melted.

title: Garlic Mashed Potatoes
instructions: Boil potatoes with garlic. Mash with butter, cream, salt, and pepper.

title: Falafel
instructions: Blend chickpeas with onion, garlic, and spices. Form into balls and fry.

title: Tzatziki
instructions: Mix Greek yogurt with grated cucumber, minced garlic, dill, and lemon juice.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Bread and fry eggplant slices. Layer with marinara sauce and cheese. Bake until bubbly.

title: Chicken Caesar Wrap
instructions: Mix chicken with Caesar dressing. Wrap with lettuce and parmesan in a tortilla.

title: Minestrone Soup
instructions: Sauté vegetables. Add broth and pasta. Simmer until pasta is cooked.

title: Avocado Toast
instructions: Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread on toasted bread.

title: Beef and Broccoli
instructions: Cook beef with garlic and ginger. Add broccoli and soy sauce. Serve over rice.

title: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth.

title: Chicken Fajitas
instructions: Cook chicken with peppers, onions, and fajita seasoning. Serve with tortillas.

title: Cornbread
instructions: Mix dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients. Bake until golden brown.

title: Tomato Basil Soup
instructions: Sauté onions and garlic. Add tomatoes and broth. Simmer and blend. Stir in basil.

title: Pita Bread Pizza
instructions: Top pita with sauce, cheese, and toppings. Bake until cheese is melted.

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients and dress with olive oil.

title: Chili Con Carne
instructions: Cook beef with onion and spices. Add beans and tomatoes. Simmer.

title: Tacos al Pastor
instructions: Marinate pork and grill. Serve on tortillas with pineapple, onion, and cilantro.

title: Chicken Noodle Soup
instructions: Cook chicken with vegetables. Add broth and noodles. Simmer.

title: Bulgur Wheat Salad
instructions: Cook bulgur wheat. Mix with vegetables and parsley. Dress with lemon juice.

title: Pumpkin Soup
instructions: Cook pumpkin with onions and garlic. Add broth and blend. Stir in cream.

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
instructions: Stuff mushrooms with a mixture of cream cheese, garlic, and parsley. Top with bread crumbs and bake.

title: BBQ Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in BBQ sauce. Bake or grill until cooked through.

title: Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs and milk. Cook in a pan. Add cheese, ham, and spinach. Fold and cook until set.

title: Pork Stir-Fry
instructions: Stir-fry pork with vegetables, ginger, and garlic. Add soy sauce and cook until done.

title: Apple Crisp
instructions: Mix sliced apples with cinnamon and sugar. Top with a mixture of oats, flour, butter, and brown sugar. Bake until crispy.
